function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of COVID-19 due to human dominancy in the environment","Impact":"High infection and death rates from COVID-19","Mitigation":"Reduction of human dominancy and strict social lockdowns","Technologies":"Alcoholic-based standard sterilizers, masks","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Drastic climate change due to reduction of human dominancy in environment","Impact":"Environmental changes that may negatively impact biodiversity and wildlife","Mitigation":"Adoption of renewable energy sources and long-term environmental policies","Technologies":"Solar energy, wind turbines","People":"Environmental organizations, government, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental organizations, government"},{"Description":"High air pollution levels at home due to COVID-19 and reduction of outdoor activities","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission indoors","Mitigation":"Use of masks indoors and enhanced indoor air quality measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Individuals, government"}]}
